file_content.text: Please, just go.
Nem'ro found someone with no morals to destroy my village! Are you proud of yourself?
Filthy murderer! Will you butcher all the women and children as well?
Nobody else needs to die but you, Huttsbane.
No, just you.
There is no reason to kill Huttsbane!
There's no bounty on them--just you.
Of course not.
Wait! Perhaps there is another way!
I'll kill anyone I have to in order to finish this job.
If necessary.
You don't need to kill anyone else!
The Hutts would slaughter us like criminals, when it is they who have taken what is not theirs.
Yes. This planet was home for Evocii long before the Hutts came.
You are a warrior. You must understand why we fight for our birthright.
If you've got a pitch, hurry up and make it.
We negotiating here?
Don't bore me with your politics.
I don't care.
You waste your breath, Spirit-leader. This is just more outsider scum.
This particular scum's going to enjoy killing you.
Wrong thing to say. [Attack]
If you've got a counteroffer, make it.
I'm still listening.
No more chitchat. [Attack]
Hutts are fat, thieving slugs--no doubt about that.
You got a raw deal, true.
You see, Huttsbane? Not all outsiders bow before the Hutts.
You are here for Huttsbane's head, but Nem'ro does not know one Evocii from another. Dead warriors' heads all look alike to him....
You would desecrate our dead and give it to this... to an outsider?
Won't Nem'ro be suspicious when Huttsbane keeps raiding?
I see a flaw.
From this day forward, our young warrior will aid his people from the shadows.
You want me to bring Nem'ro another Evocii head? Clever.
Pretty sneaky.
It is the only way to save a warrior who inspires greatness in our people.
No! There is no honor in making deals and butchering our own dead.
Calm yourself, Huttsbane. I fear this outsider will best you if it comes to battle.
Today, we must place survival above honor. Outsider--will you take the head of a dead warrior as a substitute?
This is against my better judgment, but I'll do it.
Hmm... all right.
Good. Give me a moment....
Here is the head of a fallen warrior. Nem'ro is a great fool. He will accept it as Huttsbane's. Now please, go.
You have killed many Evocii warriors today. Do not return here.
A woman of my particular skills goes anywhere she wants.
I don't need a welcome.
A man of my particular skills goes anywhere he wants.
I don't need a welcome.
Sorry about that--sometimes, it's inevitable.
Wasn't my choice.
Goodbye.
Please, just go in peace.
If I get to slice it off your dead warrior's shoulders, I'm in.
Only if I can hack it off.
Some things cannot be said and go unpunished!
I'd never miss out on fighting the infamous Huttsbane.
No substitutes. [Attack]
Honestly, I'd rather just kill everyone here.
I prefer bloodshed. [Attack]
Come and fall under my blades!
Warriors! Rally to Huttsbane!
